title: New weekend gamemode[IDEA]
body:
Greetings,

With seeing all the recent game modes that are playable each weekend, I had an idea.

Make a game mode which is a game mode from Season 1 and/or 2 etc, With old items, old champions, old skins and old Mechanics, As im sure this is all archived somewhere, if so it wouldn't be too hard to get running for a fun blast from the past Game mode,

Cheers - Andeey

replies.body: I would love that, however season 1 champs were broken, and would probably break the game.

It would be harder to do than creating a new game mode. They have changed the way league runs to an entirely new format, the item's would be severely out of whack and they delete champs 6 months or so after their reworks.
